childMarkdownRemark.html: Software development never really ends. It’s just one release to the next, so how does one release process really starts? Tune in to our next event to find out!
Do you know how to use Git? Let’s rephrase that, do you know how to harness the full power of Git, as a tool to manage infrastructure and operational procedures? Tune in to our next event!

Henlo!

It’s time for a recap of recent events in April, and a sneek peek of what’s coming up next. Stay tuned!
We’re officially kicking off NoFail Coding Contest 2021!! Register your spot through HackerRank
